title: Precious Bun
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Fwaaah....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You seem tired. Were you doing any rituals last night?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No, you weren’t there with me, little demon Lili, so I didn’t do anything. I just stayed up late streaming games.... Fwaah~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I see. Were you in a rush this morning?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>A little bit. Why did you ask?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Your bun is falling apart just a little bit, Yoshiko-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh!? Really!? Aaaaargh~~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Should I fix it for you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yeah, quickly! Hurry up and do it~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, alright. Stay still~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
